concept.description: Labels all types annotated with javax.ejb.Stateless with EJB and STATELESS.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:TYPE) WHERE a.FQN="javax.ejb.Stateless" SET t:EJB:STATELESS RETURN t AS statelessEjb

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with javax.ejb.Stateful with EJB and STATEFUL.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:TYPE) WHERE a.FQN="javax.ejb.Stateful" SET t:EJB:STATEFUL RETURN t AS statefulEjb

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with javax.ejb.MessageDriven with EJB and MESSAGEDRIVEN.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:TYPE) WHERE a.FQN="javax.ejb.MessageDriven" SET t:EJB:MESSAGEDRIVEN RETURN t AS messageDrivenBean

concept.description: Labels all classes annotated with javax.ejb.Singleton with EJB and SINGLETON.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:TYPE) WHERE a.FQN="javax.ejb.Singleton" SET t:EJB:SINGLETON RETURN t AS singletonEjb
